Articles.Content:
Hey guys it's your friendly neighborhood noob again

So in the past before 1.2 I have been able to open the debug menu with alt F12. However now it does't seem to open when pressing those keys. Is there an option to enable the window now? Not interested in any sort of hardcore cheating but my reflexes aren't quite as good as a computers so getting that perfect in sync orbit for my sat network is rather difficult. Any tips? Thanks guys! Really enjoying this update and once I can get this debug window working I will have no need for Mechjeb anymore and can run a fully stock game

I'm having the same problem....    alt-F12 worked at the beginning of the game (i started 2 days ago)   today there was some update from CKAN, so I'll try removing mods one by one to see if that changes anything...  I have about 8 mods installed right now...

 

Cheers

Reg

The debug menu looks a lot different now than it used to, but on Windows it's still alt F12. If alt F12 isn't bringing it up, then there's something messed up with your setup -- maybe do a file verification if you are on Steam.

Found the culprit..   for me, it was actually NVIDIA's "GeForce Experience program running in the background...     in the sharing menu, it was using the keys Alt-F12 to toggle FPS counter... I changed it to Alt-Shift-F12...  and now, in the game alt-f12 works....    

Cheers.

Reg
Yep that's what it was, I also had Nvidia Experience running, changed the keys to Shift Alt F12 just like you did and it brings the debug window up just fine now. Thanks!
